name: Shadowfade
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Heroes of the Darklands © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: In areas of darkness, the target of shadowfade is invisible to creatures using darkvision to see. In areas of dim light, the target gains concealment against creatures using darkvision. This spell has no effect in areas of normal light or brighter, and is automatically dispelled if the target enters an area of bright light or takes a hostile action.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一条蒙眼布)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 于黑暗区域中，渐消阴影的受术者对于使用黑暗视觉视物的生物是不可见的。在低光(dim light)区域中，在对抗使用黑暗视觉的生物时受术者获得隐蔽(concealment)。在正常光亮或更亮的环境中此法术没有效果，并且，如果受术者进入强光(bright light)区域或作出一个带有敌意的行动，那此法术自动解除。
